name: Mr. Gill
review: I recently purchased a Pure Latex Mattress and the quality of the mattress is very good at such an affordable rate. The latex mattress has little holes in it to increase the air circulation which helps in reducing the heat. The Comfort level of the mattress is Medium Firm tending towards Firm hence it supports the back really well. I would recommend this Mattress to people who enjoy sleeping on Medium Firm â€“ Firm Mattress.

name: Shinoy Kaladharan
review: Purchased latex mattress and latex pillow. Product quality and customer handling is great.

name: Hridya R Krishna
review: Good Matress with premium comfort. Bought 75*60*4 inch full latex mattress from nestin. Delivery and packaging are super.

name: Rajiv divakaran
review: Comfortable Duo latex mattress. Good customer support and service too by the NestiN Mattress.
